settings.text: "Like many women, I always felt confused about which products to use and in what combination and I've always been skeptical of marketing claims."
settings.text-2:
(Board-Certified Plastic Surgeon,
Founder of MD GLAM)

settings.description: MD GLAM was formulated and founded by scientist and Beverly Hills plastic surgeon Dr. Cat Begovic. In 2005 Dr. Cat started her journey by researching the science behind anti-aging skin care products. She had used skincare products her whole life, but was frustrated finding one that was effective and had all the ingredients she wanted. She also had difficulty finding products that smelled fresh and light and were non-greasy. Being a published scientist with a degree in Molecular Biology from Harvard - she wanted to investigate what ingredients and compounds had real scientific data. In 2007, she published her research in the Aesthetic Surgery Journal entitled “The truth about over-the-counter topical anti-aging products: a comprehensive review.” From that research and through continued scientific investigation, she launched her skincare line MD GLAM in 2017.
settings.description-third: "I have put the same love and passion into taking care of my patients and their surgeries as I have putintoeverystepofcreatingthisskincarelinethatIamsoproudandpassionateabout..."-Dr.Cat

settings.description: At MD GLAM we believe in continual evolutionary self-initiated change, improvement, learning, and the advancement of standards. We are dedicated to the quality and luxury of products, service, relationships, and communications, and in the way, we deliver our products. We are dedicated to the quality of our promises. We are committed to the highest standards of quality, ethics, and integrity. We simply don’t want to do anything without high quality.

We help people feel good about themselves. That’s how we bringkindness into the world. We are in the business of improving andempowering human life. Our success in achieving this must measure all our actions. When people feel good about themselves, they are kinder to the world. This is how we make our contribution to society.
settings.description-sec: “When people feel good about themselves, they are kinder to the world. This is how we make our contribution to society.”

settings.description: Every product we introduce is a unique contribution to the market, not one that is introduced just for the purpose of making money. It must therefore be innovative, high quality, and the unquestioned best in its category. The little things matter, our packaging is custom-created and designed meticulously, meant to hold and preserve the freshness of our products. MD GLAM products combine the most effective, scientifically proven anti-aging and hydrating ingredients to improve how the skin looks and feels. MD GLAM products are simple to use. The products are clean, safe, and gentle and Dr. Cat feels comfortable even using them on her 10-year-old daughter. They are paraben-free, sulfate-free, and cruelty-free. To make it more affordable to Dr. Cat’s patients and consumers, we have skipped distribution, retail, and any other middleman completely to sell it directly to our customers. MD GLAM is sold strictly and exclusively here at MDGLAM.COM.

Just as medicine is constantly evolving, so is the field of skincare and anti-aging and we are committed to constantly researching new ingredients and staying on the cutting edge of skincare and anti-aging research so that all the products are nnovative as well as effective. We believe in continual evolutionary self-initiated change, mprovement, learning, and the advancement of standards for their own sake.
settings.description-sec: "We believe in continual evolutionary self-initiated change, improvement, learning, and the advancement of standards for their own sake."

settings.description: We value our ability to serve the customer and to create an amazing customer experience throughout all touchpoints. Our service standards are as stiff as our product standards. Our customers must always be met with a smile in all communications, emails, phone calls, chat, newsletters, ads, blogs, and commercials.
settings.description-sec: "Our customers must always be met with a smile in all communications, emails, phone calls, chat, newsletters, ads, blogs, and commercials."

settings.description: We believe in enlightened self-interest by respecting the individual. We are fully dedicated to the customer and our employees. We care about our customers and employees and are invested in their success. We believe in respecting, valuing, and empowering the individual. We believe in having a long-term commitment to employee development. We believe that we should be, for all who have been involved, a place of realized potential. We believe it’s everyone’s right to pursue beauty and personal improvement. We are committed to true belonging in our organization, where everyone who fully commits to our values can feel they belong. That all our employees will always be treated with equal respect regardless of job position or title. That everyone’s opinion is valued and that it matters.

settings.heading-mobile: PLASTIC SURGEON IN BEVERLY HILLS,AND SCIENTIST
settings.title: IN BEVERLY HILLS,
settings.description: As a woman, a plastic surgeon in Beverly Hills, and scientist, I am very particular about anything I put on my skin and only want the best. I’ve used skincare products my whole life, but it's been frustrating finding one that was effective and had all the ingredients I wanted. I also had a hard time finding products that smelled fresh and light and were non-greasy.
settings.description-sec: In 2005 I started my journey and started researching the science behind anti-aging skin care products. Being a published scientist with a degree in Molecular Biology from Harvard - I wanted to investigate what ingredients and compounds had real scientific data.
settings.description-third: In 2007, I published my research in the Aesthetic Surgery Journal entitled “The truth about over-the-counter topical anti-aging products: a comprehensive review.” From that research and through continued scientific investigation, I developed my skin care line MD GLAM.

settings.heading-mobile: MD GLAM IS AN EXTENSION OF MYSELF
settings.title: IS AN EXTENSION
settings.description:
01

Based on science, but with the luxury all women desire.

02

Combine the most effective, scientifically proven anti-aging and hydrating ingredients to improve the way skin looks and feels.

03

MD GLAM products are simple to use.

04

The products are clean, safe, and gentle that I feel comfortable even using them on my own daughter. They are paraben-free, sulfate-free, and cruelty-free. To make it more affordable to my patients and consumers, I have skipped distribution, retail, and any other middle man completely to sell it directly to customers.

05

MD GLAM is sold strictly and exclusively through MDGLAM.COM. I am super excited to share my exclusive skin care line with all of you - Enjoy!!

My mission is to provide the best possible skin care products that I can stand behind 100% with effective anti-aging and skin health ingredients based on scientific research. I have put the same love and passion into taking care of my patients and their surgeries as I have put into every step of creating this skincare line that I am so proud and excited about.
settings.description-sec: Just as medicine is constantly evolving, so is the field of skin care and anti-aging and I am committed to constantly researching new ingredients and staying on the cutting edge of skin care and anti-aging research so that all the products are innovative as well as effective.
settings.description-third: As a plastic surgeon I meet women every day who choose more invasive ways of achieving their aesthetic goals, but I feel that daily skin care maintenance is critical to looking young and beautiful and slowing the aging process.

settings.text: MD GLAM is an extension of myself and my way of reaching out and helping women take care of themselves, feel amazing, be the best possible version of who they are.

settings.des_2: Sale up to 60% off on selected items. End ins:
